title: Common English Word Pairs
content: This set contains frequently used English word pairs that are often confused or related in meaning.

content_translation.bn: এই সেটে প্রায়শই ব্যবহৃত ইংরেজি শব্দ জোড়া রয়েছে যা প্রায়ই বিভ্রান্ত বা অর্থে সম্পর্কিত হয়।
content_translation.hi: इस सेट में अक्सर इस्तेमाल किए जाने वाले अंग्रेजी शब्द जोड़े शामिल हैं जिन्हें अक्सर भ्रमित या अर्थ में संबंधित होते हैं।

word_set_lists.word_1_meaning: To influence or have an impact on something
word_set_lists.word_2_meaning: The result or outcome of a cause
word_set_lists.word_1_example_sentence: The weather will affect our travel plans.
word_set_lists.word_2_example_sentence: The medicine had a rapid effect on the symptoms.

word_set_lists.word_1_meaning: To agree to receive or take something offered
word_set_lists.word_2_example_sentence: Everyone went to the party except John.

word_set_lists.word_2_meaning: To give advice or counsel to someone
word_set_lists.word_1_example_sentence: He gave me some good advice about buying a car.
word_set_lists.word_2_example_sentence: The lawyer will advise you on legal matters.
